body:
Visma

Visma makes businesses more efficient, through offerings of software, outsourcing services, commerce solutions, retail-IT solutions and IT-related projects and consulting. Visma simplifies and digitalizes core business processes within the private and public sector. 340,000 customers in Northern Europe utilize Visma’s products and services and an additional 330,000 use Visma as a hosting partner. The group has 7000 employees and its net revenue amounted to NOK 7 000 million in 2015.

Visma is known for developing leading software and high-quality services for satisfied customers in combination with financial strength and solid growth. The objective is to make the customers more efficient and competitive through freedom of choice between software solutions and outsourcing services.  

.net Software Developer

We have a challenging opportunity for an ambitious and motivated Software Developer to join our Visma User Directory team. We are building an User Directory and Single Sign-On (SSO) solution that is an important component in Visma’s drive for integrated products & services toward hybrid strategy. You will work in R&D office from Sibiu, together with colleagues in Norway and Romania - and a lot of colleagues from the other teams spread in locations from nordic countries.

As a Software Developer you will be working with design, implementation and maintenance of new and existing features of our VUD asset. In your work you will need to focus on architecture, usability, performance, stability, security, etc.


Work tasks and responsibilities:

•	Design, implementation and testing of solutions

•	Participate in architecture, design and code reviews

•	Write unit and integration tests

•	Maintain good code quality

•	Keeping up-to-date on new technologies, methods and tools

•	Participate in our Scrum processes and other team activities


We believe that you have:

•	Bachelor or Master degree in Computer Science

•	Experience in C# and Microsoft technology stack

•	Solid Object Oriented Programming knowledge, design patterns

•	Knowledge of and experience with SQL databases - modelling and development

•	Hands-on experience with unit testing & Test Driven Development, knowledge about other types of tests and tools is a plus

•	Understanding of security, certificates and identity providers is a plus

•	Interest in software engineering methods, design patterns and modelling

•	Good spoken and written English


Personal skills:

•	Well-structured and quality focused attitude

•	Team spirit and good communication skills

•	Analytical mind-set and well organized with attention to details

•	Self-motivated and self-driven

•	User experience and customer satisfaction oriented


We will offer you:

•	An exciting position in an international working environment (R&D community of 600+ employees)

•	You will be part of a dynamic and highly skilled team

•	We offer you a creative working environment and the latest technologies and tools

•	Good opportunities for career development in a large international company

•	Competitive terms and conditions

•	International travels for trainings and workshops

•	Access to company apartments in Spain and France


Position: full time
Location: Sibiu, Romania
title: .net Software Developer
locations: Av. Ilie Macelaru nr.2, Sibiu, Județul Sibiu, România
